message:
At work, I am about to build a SOAP API in PHP.

I am considering one of two options. Either using the native SoapServer class in PHP or Zend_Soap_Server class.

Does anybody here have any recommendations, or tips on which way to go?!

Or does anybody have any useful resources to read?!

data.message:
this is pretty promising and fast:

http://www.sitepoint.com/web-services-with-php-and-soap-1/

I have seen this article. The problem is it uses NuSOAP which is not actively developed anymore.

Last update to code was over 2 or 3 years ago.
Although it generates WSDL for you, which is a huge plus
